Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.PreGame

Class LobbyListJoinGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.PreGame.LobbyListJoinGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class LobbyListJoinGUI extends Object implements Observer
This class represents the GUI component responsible for housing the lobby list.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the component based on the current state of the model. This method is called by the observer. It updates the list of lobbies by adding the new ones and removing the ones that are not present in the model.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer

    • listViewLobbyCellFactory

      public javafx.scene.control.ListCell<LightLobby> listViewLobbyCellFactory()
      Returns a cell factory for the list view of lobbies. Each cell will display the name of the lobby.
      Returns:
      a cell factory for the list view of lobbies

    • linkLabelToSelection

      public javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<LightLobby> linkLabelToSelection()
      Returns a change listener that links the label to the selection of the list view.
      Returns:
      a change listener that links the label to the selection of the list view

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby()
      Joins the selected lobby.
